name: Paladins of the Galaxy
description:
Are you ready to defend the galaxy?

Step into this stellar battlefield and justify your rank Paladin in this unique, competitive, 3D, multiplayer shooting game! Fulfill the legacy and prove yourself once again as a true defender of your cosmic tribe! Once again, galaxy needs you!

Join this epic sci-fi war between forces of the Dark and forces of the Light! Whose side you will choose is entirely up to you, but remember one thing – your choice will change everything. In this online, multiplayer, packed with action game you will need to perfect your skills to the max in order to preserve survival of your galaxy tribe! Paladins are the high-ranked warriors that each galaxy has. Not anyone can became one, just the chosen ones! Enter this multiplayer stellar battlefield and answer the call Paladin! This online shooter game will grant you hours of fun, excitement and thrill. Create your winning tactics by choosing perfect weapon set from variety of galaxy swords, plasma guns and laser pistols. Enjoy in beautiful graphics, different worlds and galaxies, but most of all – pick your favorite Paladin!

Sometimes only courage will be on your side! Armed with just that, intercede stellar battle and prove your legacy of being the best Paladin of the Galaxy! Upgrade your weapons, build up your character and explore different stages and galaxies in this unique, multiplayer shooting game! Use the special features that each character has and bring your opponent to his knees! If you get yourself in tricky situation, use double-jump ability to get away from that. Activate the force shield and become invisible, but only for limited period of time. You can also use crates and barrels as a shield and throw them on your opponent and do some damage! But still, galaxy swords are the ultimate slicing weapons!
